s.text: In an interview Thursday with Yediot Aharanot , Israel's new prime minister, Labor Party leader Ehud Barak, thanked Tony Blair for showing him the way to his election victory.
Blair insisted on finding out why they really lost, and in this way arrived at a victorious campaign."
Blair insisted on finding out why they really lost, and in this way arrived at a victorious campaign."
A document purporting to come from the Red Brigades, a guerrilla group thought to have been eliminated, later claimed responsibility for the killing.
